content: this simple sea glass baby blanket was such a joy to crochet creating this blanket has been an absolute delight thanks to its uncomplicated yet repetitive stitch pattern it provides the perfect opportunity for your mind to wander freely as your hands work their magic a great project to do while hanging out with the family baby blanket sizes this blanket is 28 x 33 inches which is close to a square blanket it s just the right size for a baby blanket toddler blanket or lapghan lovey square baby blanket toddler blanker or lapghan throw blanket large afghan straight box stitch baby blanket pattern this easy project uses the straight box stitch which uses the chain stitch single_crochet and the double_crochet stitch worked in clusters it s a great blanket for beginners and works up quickly skill level confident beginner crocheter experience level you should be able to read a crochet pattern and work double_crochet stitches and chain stitches size finished size 28 x 33 inches materials agave wander acrylic yarn 2 skeins or 240 yards patina wander acrylic yarn 2 skeins or 240 yards wintermint wander acrylic yarn 2 skeins or 240 yards total amount of yarn 720 yards crochet hook size i 5 5 mm hook yarn needle scissors
